text: Ravina Raj Kohli, earlier President of the STAR News and the Chief Executive officer of Channel Nine, is one of the prominent media personalities of India. ==References== *The Voyage To Excellence by Nichinta Amarnath and Debashish Ghosh, ) Category:Indian businesspeople Category:People from Madhya Pradesh Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ravina Raj Kohli
